Synthesizer

Controls

  • 'o' key : creates a new oscillator
  • 'f' key : creates a new filter
  • spacebar : toggles demo sound on/off
  • Clicking eligible nodes in the routing table directs output from the source node to the clicked node

Take Note

  • Added oscillators will be audible on the next key pressed
  • Altered oscillator parameters will be audible immediately
